original_title: A Night at Switch n' Play
overview: Switch nâ€™ Play is a queer performance collective that stages fabulous subversive drag and burlesque  shows. The ensemble explodes traditional gender roles, pushing the limits of what drag and burlesque can  be. But more than that, they are a tight-knit family of outsiders who welcome queer audiences into their world and create a safe, tantalizing space where everyone can be themselves. The film introduces diverse members of the collective and sprinkles in a generous helping of delicious live performances.
title: A Night at Switch n' Play
